It is obtained as a rare drop from killing lizardmen, brutes and shamans. It can also be obtained by stealing from stone chests in the Lizardman Temple beneath Molch, albeit at a slightly rarer rate.

Xeric's talisman is an amulet that was once owned by Xeric, a tyrannical ruler who reigned over Great Kourend during the Age of Strife nearly 1,030 years ago. It is obtained as a rare drop from killing lizardmen, brutes and shamans. It can also be obtained by stealing from stone chests in the Lizardman Temple beneath Molch, albeit at a slightly rarer rate.

Xeric's Talisman teleport locations

Upon obtaining the talisman, it is inert and uncharged. By charging the talisman with lizardman fangs (costing 20 coins per charge), the talisman becomes able to teleport players to various locations throughout Great Kourend. Each fang provides one charge for the talisman, holding a maximum of 1,000 charges. The charges can be removed whenever a player wishes to do so by selecting the Uncharge option on the charged talisman. This will revert the amulet back to a Xeric's talisman (inert) and return the fangs used to charge it.

It is possible to obtain multiple talismans. However, the charges are not shared between the amulets; thus, they do not stack in the bank. Extra talismans can be dismantled, providing 100 lizardman fangs, giving it an indirect value of 2,000.

In order to use the teleport to Xeric's Honour, the player must complete at least one successful raid in the Chambers of Xeric and receive an Ancient tablet. Using the tablet on the amulet will then permanently unlock this option.

At level 72 Construction, the Xeric's talisman can be mounted in a player's Portal Nexus room within their player-owned house. This requires an inert Xeric's talisman, 1 mahogany plank, 1 gold leaf and 5,000 lizardman fangs. While mounted, the talisman provides unlimited teleport charges.

Teleportation options[edit | edit source]

A player teleports using Xeric's talisman.
Destination Map
1. Xeric's Lookout, at its entrance south-east of Shayzien.
2. Xeric's Glade, by the magic trees north-east of the Hosidius farming patch.
3. Xeric's Inferno, at the lovakite furnace in the centre of Lovakengj
4. Xeric's Heart, next to the statue at Kourend Castle.

Unlocked upon completion of the Architectural Alliance miniquest.

5. Xeric's Honour, at the summit of Mount Quidamortem.

Players must use an ancient tablet on the talisman before being able to teleport here.

Item sources[edit | edit source]

With the exception of stone chests, the drop rate of the talisman is increased to 1/125 after completing the easy Kourend & Kebos Diary.
For an exhaustive list of all known sources for this item, see here (include RDT).
SourceLevelQuantityRarity
Lizardman brute75 11/250; 1/125
Lizardman shaman150 11/250; 1/125
Lizardman Level 53 11/250; 1/125
Lizardman Level 62 11/250; 1/125
Stone chestN/A 11/300

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
16 June 2021
(update)

The "Xeric's Look-out" teleport option while equipped was renamed to "Xeric's Lookout".

7 March 2019
(update | poll)

The talisman was graphically updated.

10 January 2019
(update)
  • Xeric's talisman can now be obtained outside of combat by stealing from stone chests.
  • The drop rate of the talisman is now doubled (excluding stone chests) upon completion of the easy Kourend & Kebos Diary.
26 July 2018
(update | poll)

The teleport animation was graphically updated from the default teleport animation to a unique one.

12 January 2017
(update)

Xeric's Honour teleport was added.

8 December 2016
(update | poll)

The "Dismantle" option was added, allowing an inert Xeric's talisman to be dismantled into 100 lizardman fangs.

4 August 2016
(update | poll)

Xeric's Heart teleport was added.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The Xeric's talisman can be dismantled by using a pet rock on it, resulting in a message saying "You bash the talisman with the rock, smashing it into fang-like shards.".

{{Infobox Item |defver = 2 |version1 = Inert |version2 = Charged |name1 = Xeric's talisman (inert) |name2 = Xeric's talisman |image1 = [[File:Xeric's talisman (inert).png]] |image2 = [[File:Xeric's talisman.png]] |release = [[7 January]] [[2016]] |update = Zeah: Great Kourend |members = Yes |quest = No |tradeable = No |placeholder1 = No |placeholder2 = Yes |equipable = Yes |stackable = No |noteable = No |options1 = Wear, Check, Dismantle |options2 = Wear, Rub, Check, Uncharge |wornoptions1=Check |wornoptions2=Xeric's Lookout, Xeric's Glade, Xeric's Inferno, Xeric's Heart, Xeric's Honour |destroy1 = Drop |destroy2 = Uncharge |examine1 = A dormant relic of the ancient times of Kourend. |examine2 = An enervated relic of the ancient times of Kourend. |value1 = 350 |value2 = 351 |weight = 0.060 |id1 = 13392 |id2 = 13393 }} {{Synced switch |version1 = [[File:Xeric's talisman (inert) detail.png|left|130px]] |version2 = [[File:Xeric's talisman detail.png|left|130px]] }} '''Xeric's talisman''' is an amulet that was once owned by [[Xeric]], a tyrannical ruler who reigned over [[Great Kourend]] during the Age of Strife nearly 1,030 years ago. It is obtained as a rare drop from killing [[lizardmen]], [[Lizardman brute|brutes]] and [[Lizardman shaman|shamans]]. It can also be obtained by stealing from [[stone chest]]s in the [[Lizardman Temple]] beneath [[Molch]], albeit at a slightly rarer rate. [[File:Xeric's talisman locations.png|thumb|300px|Xeric's Talisman teleport locations]] Upon obtaining the talisman, it is inert and uncharged. By charging the talisman with [[lizardman fang]]s (costing {{Coins|{{GEP|Lizardman fang}}}} coins per charge), the talisman becomes able to teleport players to various locations throughout Great Kourend. Each fang provides one charge for the talisman, holding a maximum of 1,000 charges. The charges can be removed whenever a player wishes to do so by selecting the ''Uncharge'' option on the charged talisman. This will revert the amulet back to a Xeric's talisman (inert) and return the fangs used to charge it. It is possible to obtain multiple talismans. However, the charges are not shared between the amulets; thus, they do not stack in the bank. Extra talismans can be dismantled, providing 100 lizardman fangs, giving it an indirect value of {{Coins|100*{{GEP|Lizardman fang}}}}. In order to use the teleport to Xeric's Honour, the player must complete at least one successful raid in the [[Chambers of Xeric]] and receive an [[Ancient tablet]]. Using the tablet on the amulet will then permanently unlock this option. At level 72 [[Construction]], the Xeric's talisman can be [[Mounted xeric's talisman|mounted]] in a player's [[Portal Nexus]] room within their [[player-owned house]]. This requires an inert Xeric's talisman, 1 [[mahogany plank]], 1 [[gold leaf]] and 5,000 lizardman fangs. While mounted, the talisman provides unlimited teleport charges. {{Infobox Bonuses |version1 = Inert |version2 = Charged |astab = 0 |aslash = 0 |acrush = 0 |amagic1 = +2 |amagic2 = +3 |arange = 0 |dstab = 0 |dslash = 0 |dcrush = 0 |dmagic1 = 0 |dmagic2 = +1 |drange = 0 |str = 0 |rstr = 0 |mdmg = 0 |prayer = 0 |slot = neck |image1 = [[File:Xeric's talisman (inert) equipped.png|100px]] |image2 = [[File:Xeric's talisman equipped.png|100px]] |altimage1 = [[File:Xeric's talisman (inert) equipped female.png|100px]] |altimage2 = [[File:Xeric's talisman equipped female.png|100px]] }} ==Teleportation options== [[File:Xeric's talisman teleport.gif|thumb|120px|A player teleports using Xeric's talisman.]] {{TeleportLocationTableHead}} {{TeleportLocationLine|name=1.
